ygData.subject: Re: Rune of Howling
ygData.msgSnippet: Runes are a research item for one of the other classes, wizard or magician.  Necros use Words. E ... -- Maybe I was mean but I really don t think so You asked
ygData.messageBody:
Runes are a research item for one of the other classes, wizard or
magician. Necros use Words.

E

osmosis wrote:
>
> From: osmosis <osmosis@...>
>
> I have recently aquired a rune of howling from a goblin... can anyone tell
> me what these are for? It is worth over 2 plat at an npc, and no-one
> responds to my offers to sell it. Can I make this into a ring? Has anyone
> tried with enchanted silver? Also is a lightstone ring possible?
>
> Cogg - Rallos Zek
>
